posts.post_content:
Prices are net to me.  PP f/f preferred, but reg PP is fine if you add the 3.2%.  Check/MO also fine.  Shipping is free (within the U.S.).  

Matty dark cap $395
Matty portrait $225
Young bare hand $325
Young glove shows $325
Keeler portrait P150 poor $72
Keeler bat ***tough SC 350/25*** $110
Lajoie throw ***tough SC 350/25*** $160  SOLD
Lajoie portrait (bit of paper loss on reverse) $160
Lajoie bat $165
Tinker portrait (two wrinkles that barely break the surface, and a small indent that can only be seen at an angle above his head on the right side of the card) $92
Keeler portrait P150 GD+ (the one at the bottom) $90
Added Lajoie, Tinker and Keeler portraits
I'll take the Lajoie throwing. I'll send the PP right after my coffee.
